title: Sustainable HR Recruiting & Onboarding
overview: Recruiting represents the initial engagement with prospective talent and serves as an opportunity to communicate company values and commitment to sustainability. Even candidates who aren't hired should experience quality interactions that reflect positively on the organization.

solutions.title: Adapt Your Job Descriptions
solutions.description: Focus on essential behaviors and competencies rather than exhaustive requirements.
best_practices: Focus on behaviors and competencies rather than exhaustive requirements
Excessive criteria discourage female applicants from applying
Highlight organizational values and sustainability commitments
Offer flexible arrangements and limited travel expectations to attract diverse candidates
Promote opportunities for pro-bono work and professional development

solutions.title: Adopt a Sustainable Hiring and Interview Process
solutions.description: Source social companies that can find diverse profiles or allow workers with particular needs to work from home.
sustainable_practices: Partner with social enterprises sourcing underrepresented groups
Conduct virtual interviews or consolidate in-person meetings
Equip interviewers with unified messaging toolkits
Use e-signature solutions for contracts and documentation

solutions.title: Set Up a Sustainable Onboarding Pack
solutions.description: Incorporate values and sustainable initiatives in your onboarding pack. Go digital as much as possible.
onboarding_plan_components: Explanation of the different departments of the company, their roles and main stakeholders
Important persons to meet during the first weeks
Culture of the company (ways of working, where to find the information, tools used...)
Expectations of the role (objectives at 30/60/90 days)
Buddy system if there is one (someone different from the manager to allow more openness)
solutions.sustainable_pack: If you still need to provide a physical onboarding pack, think about initiatives to provide a sustainable branded pack (T-shirt, notebook, gift card for charities, etc...)
solutions.purpose: Define a proper onboarding plan to speed up inclusion, allow performance and drive longer retention.
